title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 646/86 of 28 February 1986 fixing the export refunds on wine and repealing Commission Regulation (EEC) No 204/84
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) N°  646/86
of 28 February 1986
fixing the export refunds on wine and repealing Commission Regulation  (EEC)
N° 204/84
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The export refunds for the products listed in Article 1 (2) of  Regulation (EEC) N° 345/79 shall be as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
